channel.title: Clustering Analysis on DEGminer
channel.description: Recent content in Clustering Analysis on DEGminer

item.title: Clustering Analysis
item.description: 6.1.1 Nbclust 6.1.2 ClustVis 6.1.3 Medusa 6.1.4 wcd 6.1.5 FUAT 6.1.6 hiplot 6.1.7 cola Unsupervised cluster analysis has been an integral part of transcriptomics, playing an important role in the identification of sub-groups or modelling to predict unknown samples. Breaking: Some well-used and comprehensive clustering tools are provided in this section. 6.1.1 Nbclust Introduction: The R package provides 30 indices which determine the number of clusters in a data set and it offers also the best clustering scheme from different results to the user.
